summary: It's the day of radio in Russia. The radio station staff decides to invite famous bands, who will perform live. And something goes wrong!
cast: Diana Arbenina|Leonid Barats|Aleksandr Demidov|Nikolay Fomenko|Nonna Grishaeva|Anna Kasatkina|Rostislav Khait|Aleksey Khardikov|Aleksey Kortnev|Kamil Larin|Dmitriy Maryanov|Amaliya Mordvinova|Mikhail Politseymako|Maksim Vitorgan
title: Den radio
